title: Danny & Kelly Dodd + RHOC Recap
itunes:title: Danny & Kelly Dodd + RHOC Recap
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Kelly Dodd to Everything Iconic! They talk about this season of #RHOC, the Tres Amigas, how Braunwyn is fitting in, the rumors, filming other Bravolebrities at Gay Pride, running into Heather Durbow, what's to come on the show, and ...
description:
Danny welcomes Kelly Dodd to Everything Iconic! They talk about this season of #RHOC, the Tres Amigas, how Braunwyn is fitting in, the rumors, filming other Bravolebrities at Gay Pride, running into Heather Durbow, what's to come on the show, and SO much more!

Danny then recaps this week's Real Housewives of Orange County, which featured the women visiting Beverly Hills.

Plus a few thoughts on this week's Real Housewives of Potomac!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
